message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I'm looking to save some money on this purchase.
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but $6,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $9,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $9,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $7,500, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me there?
